thread.title: Tech stocks lead rally as S&P 500 wipes out loss for the year
thread.title_full: Tech stocks lead rally as S&P 500 wipes out loss for the year - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Anna-Louise Jackson and Oliver Renick
title: Tech stocks lead rally as S&P 500 wipes out loss for the year
text: A rally in technology stocks helped the Standard & Poorâ€™s 500 index wipe out losses for the year as Microsoft Corp., Google parent Alphabet Inc. and Amazon.com Inc. added more than $80 billion in combined market value on strong quarterly earnings.
